newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia tin down four cents to 14.64 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia tin down four cents to 14.64 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell four cents to 14.64 ringgit ($5.88) a kg, in tandem with a weak close on the London Metal Exchange (LME), traders said.
"The (local) market was just following the LME...there were no other factors," said a trader. The LME closed $25 down on Friday.
Final turnover was 113 tonnes compared to 110 on Friday. The local premium against London widened to $25 from $20.
Traders said the local market's near-term direction was still dependent on the LME.
